title: Mysterious Trader
description: An armed caravan arrives at the settlement offering to exchange goods. This could be a useful relationship. What should we trade for?

options.text: Beck - Let’s take this chance to bring some comfort and joy to the people. Music, books, a little alcohol. It will be worth it.
options.outcome: For a few supplies the trader provides small luxuries that remind people of the old world. Spirits rise, but will bellies go hungry later?

options.text: Old-Timer - Energy keeps everything running. Trade excess food to make sure our infrastructure holds up.
options.outcome: The trader supplies fuel and tools. Our generators will keep humming, though food reserves take a hit.

options.text: Shady - Food is everything. People can survive without power, but not without supplies. Trade energy for food stores.
options.outcome: A solid deal. Our stockpiles grow, making survival more secure. Some complain about the power cuts, but we’ll live.
